info.title: Azure IoT Hub Portal API
info.description: Available APIs for managing devices from Azure IoT Hub.

get.summary:
Gets a list of devices as DeviceListItem from Azure IoT Hub.
Fields that do not appear in the device list are not defined here.

put.summary: this function update the twin and the device.

get.summary:
Retrieve a specific device and from the IoT Hub.
Converts it to a DeviceListItem.

parameters.name: deviceID
parameters.description: ID of the device to retrieve.

get.summary: Gets a list of deployments as ConfigListItem from Azure IoT Hub.

Retrieve a specific deployment and its modules from the IoT Hub.
Converts it to a ConfigListItem.

parameters.name: configurationID
parameters.description: ID of the deployment to retrieve.

get.summary:
Fonction permettant de récupèrer la liste des appareils Edge .
Après avoir éxecuté la query du registryManager on récupère le resultat
sous la forme d'une liste de Twin.

post.summary: this function create a device with the twin information.

get.summary:
This function return all the information we want of
a device.

put.summary: This function update the properties of a device.

get.summary:
Gets a list of devices as DeviceListItem from Azure IoT Hub.
Fields that do not appear in the device list are not defined here.

put.summary: this function update the twin and the device.

get.summary:
Retrieve a specific device and from the IoT Hub.
Converts it to a DeviceListItem.

parameters.name: deviceID
parameters.description: ID of the device to retrieve.

post.summary: Permit to execute cloud to device message.

parameters.name: commandId
parameters.description: the command who contain the name and the trame.

isConnected.description: A value indicating whether the device is currently connected.

isEnabled.description: A value indicating whether the device is enabled on the platform.

supportLoRaFeatures.description: A value indicating whether the LoRa features is supported on this model.

statusUpdatedTime.description: The device last status updated time.

isBuiltin.description: A value indicating whether this instance is builtin.

supportLoRaFeatures.description: A value indicating whether the LoRa features is supported on this model.

isBuiltin.description: A value indicating whether this instance is builtin.

alreadyLoggedInOnce.description: A value indicating whether the device has already joined the platform.

isBuiltin.description: A value indicating whether this instance is builtin.

supportLoRaFeatures.description: A value indicating whether the LoRa features is supported on this model.

Bearer.description:
Specify the authorization token got from your IDP as a header.
    > Ex: ``Authorization: Bearer * ***``
